definitions.definition: A barbiturate C 12 H 18 N 2 O 3 that is used chiefly in the form of its bitter hygroscopic sodium salt as a hypnotic and sedative .

main_definition: ( pharmacology ) A barbiturate C 12 H 18 N 2 O 3 that is used chiefly in the form of its bitter hygroscopic sodium salt as a hypnotic and sedative .
